Package com.example

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
com.example.Connection
public class Connection extends Object
This class allows the application to connect with the XMPP server. It handles all the actions related to connection, requests and notifications with and to the server. It implements several methods that allow to log in, register, delete account, send and receive messages, etc.
Author:
Daniel Gonzalez

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(String server)
      This method creates the configuration and connects to server.
      Parameters:
      server - the server to connect to.

    • register

      public int register(String username, String password)
      This method registers a user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to register
      password - the password of the new user

    • login

      public int login(String username, String password)
      This method allows a user to log in to the chat.
      Parameters:
      username -
      password -
      Returns:
      a number indicating if everything was correct when logging in.

    • logout

      public int logout()
      This method logs out a user.
      Returns:
      a number indicating that everything was correct when logging out.

    • deleteAccount

      public int deleteAccount()
      This method deletes an account from server.
      Returns:
      a number indicating whether the deletion was successful.

    • sendSubscription

      public void sendSubscription(String user)
      This method sends a subscription to a user.
      Parameters:
      user - user to send subscription to

    • getUserDetails

      public void getUserDetails(String user)
      This method gets the details of a contact.
      Parameters:
      user - user to get details from.

    • getRoster

      public String getRoster()
      This method prints out the whole roster of a user.
      Returns:
      string containing the result of the roster.

    • setStatusMessage

      public void setStatusMessage(String[] data)
      This sets the new user status, including the type of the status, the mode and the status message.
      Parameters:
      data - an array containing the type, mode and message of the new status.

    • resetChatUser

      public void resetChatUser()
      This method resets the current user. It is useful when the client stops chating.

    • chatWithUser

      public void chatWithUser(String user)
      This method allows a user to chat with another.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to chat with.

    • sendFile

      public void sendFile(String user, String path)
      This method allows to send a file as a message. For the sending of messages a specific format was defined: file|extension|file content
      Parameters:
      user - the user to send the file to.
      path - the path to the file the user wants to send.

    • createGroupChat

      public void createGroupChat(String chatRoomName, String nickname)
      This method allows to create a new group chat.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomName - the name of the group chat to create.
      nickname - the alias of the current user in the group.

    • inviteToGroupChat

      public void inviteToGroupChat(String groupName, String user)
      This method allows a user to invite another one to a group chat.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group to make the invitation from.
      user - the user to chat with.

    • joinGroupChat

      public void joinGroupChat(String chatRoomName, String nickname)
      This method allows a user to join a group chat by providing its name.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomName - the name of the group to join.
      nickname - the alias of the user in the group.

    • useGroupChat

      public void useGroupChat(String chatRoomName)
      This method shows a user a space to chat in a group chat.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomName - the group chat name.
